entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
